message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $10,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer but that's a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $6,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $10,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me a bit.  I could meet you halfway between our last offers. Would $7,500 work for you?
